front.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Signal Treatment Applied to Smart Transducers

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Signal processing algorithms and data structure are defined in this recommended practice in order to share and to infer signal and state information of an instrumentation or control system. These algorithms are based on the signal and transducers attached to the system. This recommended practice also defines a set of transducer signal treatment services based on signal treatment algorithms as application programming interface (API), which is used for applications to use or call these transducer signal treatment services.
